caption.p: Identification of terpene products by GC–MS. (A) Total ion chromatogram. (B) Chemical structures of the identified products. (C) Mass spectra of (+)-zizaene from the sample of the ZS+MevZS strain. (D) Mass spectra of (+)-zizaene authentic standard from the vetiver essential oil. Comparison of mass spectra for β-acoradiene is shown in the Supplementary Table S1.
